title: Garden Broom, Yard Brush Heavy Duty Outdoor 2-1, 50&66in, suitable for Schools, Factories, Garden Broom Outdoor,Sweeping Brush (17.7in)
features: 𝗚𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻 𝗕𝗿𝗼𝗼𝗺 & 𝗬𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗕𝗿𝘂𝘀𝗵 - Many outdoor areas require versatile floor cleaning equipment. As well as gardens and garages, large areas such as streets, schools and factories must also be kept clean. This CLEANHOME Outdoor Sweeping Brush is easy to use, clean, efficient and far more cost effective than any other floor brush or broom.

𝗨𝗻𝗶𝗾𝘂𝗲 𝗦𝗽𝗹𝗶𝘁-𝗯𝗿𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗹𝗲 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 - The 17.7in broom head covers a wide area; with its unique split bristle technology, the bristles may look a little old on the surface, but they are brand new and effectively capture fine dust. The stiff bristles are built to last and you can use this stiff broom to sweep up stones, gravel, leaves and snow.

𝗚𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻 𝗕𝗿𝗼𝗼𝗺 𝗢𝘂𝘁𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 - Push to use this broom to maximise cleaning results, we call it a push broom! The broomstick has a soft sponge in the middle of the pole, which protects your palms comfortably when you use force.
𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗹𝗲 & 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 - The floor broom can be adjusted from 50in to 66in; assembled in sections and threaded for quick and easy disassembly.

𝗬𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗕𝗿𝘂𝘀𝗵 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝘃𝘆 𝗗𝘂𝘁𝘆 𝗢𝘂𝘁𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 - Industrial brush/domestic brush for cleaning shops, garages, courtyards, schools, terraces and concrete. Can be used in different environments as garden brushes, patio brushes, yard brooms, artificial grass brushes and more.

𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲𝘀 - We endeavour to meet our customers' needs and provide high quality products. If you have any questions, suggestions and enquiries about our products, please feel free to contact us. We will reply you within 24 hours.
description: Product Description Brand Story CLEANHOME: Have an independent factory dedicated to the production of cleaning products for 35 years. We have a professional R&D and design team. We constantly improve and update our products based on feedback from our customers. If you have any questions in the use of the product, please feel free to tell us. The heavy duty broom suitable for sweeping patios, decks, sidewalks, industrial spaces, workshops, garages, and more. You can use it to clean stones, gravel, leaves and snow. Sweep Leaves Remove Water Cleaning Decks Cleaning Tiles
